name: altopeq1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpan2(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(caltop(c0, c2), caltop(c1, c2)))

comment: Equality for alternate ordered pairs. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Mar-2012.)
